review_title: Just don’t do it. Not worth it.
pros: A mix of some great people
cons: Horrible management and just no understanding of handling a business. Working there right now and can’t wait to leave

Lewis Tipp who runs the Wellington office acts very in appropriate towards staff as does Sergio who works in recruiting. They are only interested in making money for themselves and not the charities. Awful experience ruined my outlook of NZ
